protocol_name: (CVD) risk chart development, evaluation, and validation
protocol_name_html: (CVD) risk chart development, evaluation, and validation
description: In this protocol, we aimed to show the step-by.step procedures used to develop, evaluate and validate (CVD) risk charts.

PLoS ONE 12(12): e0189389. doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0189389

status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

components.data:
• Using Cox proportional hazard regression
  • A broad set of risk factors were independently assessed.
  • The most important risk factors were then hierarchically included in the model based on the higher hazard ratio and significance.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:

  • The most important risk factors were then hierarchically included in the model based on the higher hazard ratio and significance.

components.data: IF the selected risk factors are not acceptable,
components.name: Description

components.data:
• Discrimination (AUROC, Harrell’s C indices)
  • Calibration (Nam-D’Agostino chi-square test)
  • Overall bias (predefined risk threshold for incidence)
